statements: SELECT * FROM harassment_prevention WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT interaction_type, location, date FROM harassment_prevention WHERE date > '2021-08-01';
SELECT id, interaction_description FROM harassment_prevention WHERE action_taken IS NULL;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, location FROM harassment_prevention ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, interaction_type, location, action_taken FROM harassment_prevention WHERE location LIKE '%park%';
SELECT * FROM harassment_prevention WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC, location ASC
SELECT id, interaction_type, location FROM harassment_prevention WHERE interaction_type LIKE '%verbal%' ORDER BY id
SELECT interaction_type, location, date FROM harassment_prevention WHERE location = 'Office' AND interaction_type = 'Physical' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM harassment_prevention WHERE date > '2022-01-01' AND action_taken IS NOT NULL ORDER BY user_id, date
SELECT * FROM harassment_prevention WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-08-01' AND '2022-08-31' ORDER BY location
SELECT * FROM harassment_reports;
SELECT report_id, reporter_name, report_date FROM harassment_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT reported_person_name, description FROM harassment_reports WHERE report_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM discrimination_cases WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT victim_name, accused_name, description FROM discrimination_cases ORDER BY case_date;
SELECT * FROM harassment_reports WHERE reporter_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT reporter_name, description FROM harassment_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' AND report_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT reported_person_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM harassment_reports GROUP BY reported_person_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT victim_name, status FROM discrimination_cases WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY case_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT accused_name, description FROM discrimination_cases WHERE case_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY case_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM harassment_reports;
SELECT reporter_name, details FROM harassment_reports WHERE reported_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT report_id, reporter_name, reported_date FROM harassment_reports WHERE reporter_name LIKE '%Doe%';
SELECT * FROM employee_records ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department, job_title FROM employee_records WHERE department = 'Human Resources';
SELECT * FROM harassment_reports;
SELECT reporter_name, reported_date FROM harassment_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM employee_records WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT action_summary FROM action_taken JOIN harassment_reports ON action_taken.report_id = harassment_reports.report_id;
SELECT employee_name, job_title, hire_date FROM employee_records ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM harassment_reports ORDER BY date_reported DESC;
SELECT reported_user_id, reported_description FROM harassment_reports WHERE reported_user_id = 5;
SELECT incident_type, description FROM incident_log WHERE handled = false;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM action_taken ORDER BY action_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM harassment_reports ORDER BY date_reported DESC, report_id ASC;
SELECT reported_user_id, COUNT(*) FROM harassment_reports GROUP BY reported_user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE role = 'admin' OR role = 'moderator';
SELECT * FROM incident_log WHERE handled = FALSE ORDER BY incident_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT incident_type, description, action_description FROM incident_log JOIN action_taken ON incident_log.incident_id = action_taken.incident_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, name, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT name, email, role FROM users WHERE created_at < '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, complaint_text, created_at FROM complaints ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT reporter_id, report_text, created_at FROM reports WHERE status = 'resolved';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT id, name, email FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT u.name, c.complaint_text, r.report_text FROM users u JOIN complaints c ON u.id = c.user_id JOIN reports r ON c.id = r.complaint_id;
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE status='pending' ORDER BY created_at LIMIT 10;
SELECT r.report_text, a.action_type, res.resolution_text FROM reports r JOIN actions a ON r.id = a.report_id JOIN resolutions res ON a.id = res.action_id;
